newsitem.title: INDIA: India Videocon Int 95/96 div 3.5 rupees.
newsitem.headline: India Videocon Int 95/96 div 3.5 rupees.

text.p: Indian appliances firm Videocon International said it would pay a dividend of 3.5 rupees per share for 1995/96 (April-March), unchanged from the year ago payout.
The decision was taken at a board meeting on Friday, the company told the Bombay Stock Exchange.
Its associate firm Videocon Appliances set a dividend of 3.0 rupees for 1995/96, the company said.
